mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT u.realname,u.user_id FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role r ON r.user_id=u.user_id WHERE r.role_id=#{roleId}
SELECT u.* FROM sys_org_user g INNER JOIN sys_user u on u.user_id=g.user_id where g.org_id=#{orgId}

SELECT user_id userId,realname,o.`gwdj` ,o.grade FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_org_group o ON o.person_charge=u.user_id where gwdj=#{level} AND o.`gwdj` is not null and o.grade is not null and o.`gwdj` > 0
SELECT u.user_id, u.realname, u.person_photos, u.mobile FROM sys_user AS u INNER JOIN p_order AS o ON u.user_id = o.sale_id WHERE o.card_num = #{cardNum} LIMIT 1
